name: illuminate
effect: Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled. This ability has no effect in battle.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon by illuminating the surroundings.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon by illuminating the surroundings.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon by illuminating the surroundings.
